title: Variables and Mutability
description: In this lab, we explore the concept of mutability in Rust, discussing how variables are immutable by default and how to make them mutable using the mut keyword, and highlighting the importance of immutability for safety and concurrency while still acknowledging the usefulness of mutability in certain situations.

meta.title: Exploring Rust's Variables and Mutability
meta.description: Learn about the concepts of immutability and mutability in Rust programming language.
meta.keywords: rust playground, mutability, variables, rust online compiler, rust tutor, rust commands, rust practice, rust online playground, rust online, programming

i18n.title: 变量与可变性
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们探讨Rust中的可变性概念，讨论变量默认情况下如何是不可变的，以及如何使用mut关键字使其可变，并强调不可变性对于安全性和并发性的重要性，同时也承认可变性在某些情况下的有用性。

meta.title: 探索Rust的变量与可变性
meta.description: 了解Rust编程语言中的不可变性和可变性概念。
